description: This Java source file defines a REST controller class 'HelloController' which provides lightweight, public endpoints for root, documentation, health checks, and app info in a Spring Boot application. It includes endpoints for welcoming, redirecting to Swagger UI, health status, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides public endpoints for root, docs, health, and info messages.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a friendly welcome message for root endpoint.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects client to Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check status.
